explains: adj. 绸的；柔软的；丝制的

sentences.en: How her silken robe is rustling!
Presently the door swung open, and a silken page said, "The Lady Jane Grey."
sentences.cn: 不一会儿，门突然敞开，一个穿绸衣服的小侍说：“洁恩·格雷公主驾到。”

sentences.en: Tom sat up in bed and gazed out from the heavy silken curtains upon this fine company.
sentences.cn: 汤姆在床上坐了起来，透过阴暗的丝质窗帘，凝视着这群讲究的同伴。
